text:
Nulab - Amsterdam, NL - Java/Golang Developer - Onsite, full-time - https://nulab-inc.com/

Nulab is a Japanese company with headquarters in Fukuoka, Japan and offices in Tokyo, Kyoto, Singapore, New York and recently opened in Amsterdam. We make software that supports effective communication and collaboration. Our three products are Typetalk, Cacoo and Backlog.

We are looking for a Java/Golang Dev to join our new Amsterdam office. Full job description: https://nulab-inc.com/about/careers/javagolang-developer-cac...

Our interview steps: screening call -> dev team interview -> interview with one of the co-founders

Unfortunately visa sponsorship is not available for this position, so it is only open to EU citizens or candidates who already have an EU work permit. Sorry!

Feel free to email me with any questions at charlotte@nulab.co.jp
